sentences.en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
sentences.cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

sentences.en: Beneath that aloof exterior, Gayle is a warm, sympathetic person.
sentences.cn: 在冷漠的外表下，盖尔是个有同情心的热心人。

sentences.en: He has remained largely aloof from the hurly - burly of parliamentary politics.
sentences.cn: 他基本上一直对喧嚣的议会政治漠不关心.

sentences.en: He was courteous always, but aloof, remote.
sentences.cn: 他常常很客气, 但又那么冷淡 、 疏远.

sentences.en: I asked Jack for his political views, but he said he preferred to hold aloof.
sentences.cn: 我问起杰克的政治观点, 他说他宁可避而不谈.

sentences.en: I didn't like him at all. I thought he was cool, aloof, and arrogant.
sentences.cn: 我一点也不喜欢他，觉得他冷漠、孤僻而且傲慢。

sentences.en: I was 13, sunburned, shaggy - haired, a little aloof, and solitary.
sentences.cn: 我才十三岁, 皮肤黧黑,头发凌乱, 有点儿孤芳自赏, 也不免形单影只.

sentences.en: Is she aloof and arrogant or just shy?
sentences.cn: 她是冷漠傲慢还是仅仅是害羞?

sentences.en: Never stand aloof from the masses.
On the evening the girl kept herself timidly aloof from the crowd.
sentences.cn: 这小女孩在晚会上一直胆怯地远离人群.

sentences.en: The aloof composer neither worried nor cared about public opinion.
sentences.cn: 这位超然的作曲家对舆论既不担心,也不在意.

sentences.en: Thomas, of course, was cool and aloof and imperturbable.
sentences.cn: 当然，托马斯沉着、冷漠，不易激动。

sentences.en: We are against the irresponsible attitude of standing aloof from things on the ground that they're no concern of ours.
sentences.cn: 我们反对事不关己,高高挂起的自由主义态度.

trans.tran_en: unfriendly and deliberately not talking to other people
